forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
